Reviews.Title: “GROSS!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: hobobaggins
Reviews.Content: Don't ever stay here, it's disgusting!!!! Dirty towels, dirty everything. Remnants of old food and drink that was found in peoples' rooms in "hospitality" room. Froze my butt off. Woke up to a leak from a broken pipe onto my bed.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid!”
Reviews.Author: EMielkeGM
Reviews.Content: I booked a reservation for this hotel through Wyndahm's website. While still in the timeframe where I could cancel, we had a change in plans so I contacted the the hotel directly to cancel the reservation. When I called, their answer was "hello?". Not "Thank you for calling Knights Inn LA" or any indication that I had reached a business. I had to confirm that it was in fact the Knights Inn. I then asked her to cancel the reservation. She asked me what the arrival date was and when I told her she said "did you book this on your own?". I told her that yes, I booked online, and she then refused to even try to look up my reservation. She said I could cancel online. I wasn't near a computer, and just wanted to cancel it through her. She would not. I found this terribly rude and inconvenient. I manage a hotel myself and was appalled by this customer service. I am glad we didn't have to actually stay there after the way they handled their cancellations.

Reviews.Title: “Ants in Bathroom”
Reviews.Author: Catherine W
Reviews.Content: The hotel is drab and dull and there were ants in the bathroom. The bed was noisy and the towels were dirty. The shower and bath were covered in Mould and mildew and the area where the hotel is located feels very insafe. I certainly wouldnt walk around on my own and I certainly wont be staying again.

Reviews.Title: “BED UNCOMFORTABLE, BEDS NOISIER,a lot of ants.”
Reviews.Author: smilly s
Reviews.Content: Very bad hotel, dirty, the bed are noisier, towels dirty, very bad hotel, , no kleenex, no amenities, and a lot of ants, everything uncomfortable horrible, terrible I hope the health department check this dirty hotel. Please dont waste your money on this poor and ugly hotel, it's a shame, the citi need to check this

Reviews.Title: “UNSANITARY, UNHEALTHY, UNSAFE- AVOID IF POSSIBLE”
Reviews.Author: aznsk8ter96
Reviews.Content: I arrive at the hotel at 3pm to catch the Giants/Dodgers for opening day. The lady running the front desk is out DOING LAUNDRY. I end up having to wait half an hour before the lady comes back. Meanwhile, while the lady is gone, the maintenance decides to wash his face with the hose, leaving a stream of water, MAKING MY LUGGAGE WET. The lady comes back and is very rude and does not even apologize for being late (Perhaps because she appeared to know NO ENGLISH). Throws me my room key and then disappears. I enter the room to the dismay of NO TOILET PAPER, A TREE IN MY WINDOW, and UNMADE BEDS. The TV WAS BROKEN TOO. Despite all this, I paid for it so I decided to give it a try. At night, I was sleeping and was awoken first by BED BUGS. It was really itchy. The second time I woke up, some locals arguing and FIGHTING outside my window. Two GUNSHOTS sounded. I decided it was my best hope to sleep under the bed. When I was under the bed, there were ANTS. Really annoyed and sleepy, I decided to wake myself up in the shower. When I turned on the bathroom light (it took 5 minutes to turn on), there was a LOUD BUZZING SOUND. I turned on the water, and a jet of BROWN water came out. There were also COCKROACHES in the bathtub. I left the bathroom and went and tried to use the internet to the dismay that THE INTERNET DISCONNECTED EVERY FIVE MINUTES. I ended up falling asleep IN THE CLOSET with towels and bug repellent on the floor. When I woke up, I felt really NAUSEOUS. I decided some of the free breakfast would cheer me up. I went to find the breakfast room and found MOLDY BREAD and INSECTS in the cereal. In addition, there were HALF EMPTY cups. At that point, I had enough (and I have a very high tolerance for hotels), I left without caring about the other three nights I had booked. I had enough and I was out. Don't make the same mistake I did and waste several hundred dollars on this hotel. It RUINED MY VACATION.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a DUMP!!!”
Reviews.Author: joshbbQuebec_Canada
Reviews.Content: A truly nightmare experience!! This place is dirty and it smells. The breakfast area is dirty and in disarray. The beds were uncomfortable and the rooms, which were supposed to be smoke-free smelled of nothing but rancid smoke! It's far from everything. The front desk lady was opinionated and unfriendly.

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: discostu311
Reviews.Content: bad neibhorhood, bars on everything which tells you not a safe place... callled numerous times with no answer...hotel manager was not helpful at all..filthy rooms..definately not worth the money..

Reviews.Title: “A little noisy but not too bad”
Reviews.Author: GhostTripper
Reviews.Content: My fiance's band was playing a show in Hollywood (at the ROXY) and prices were too high next to the club so we stayed one night at this place which was still close enough. The freeway noise was constant since it's right next to the 101 but with the windows shut it was at least tolerable for me but I'm a heavy sleeper so someone else might have a problem with it. Other than that the rooms were clean and nice(one even had hardwood flooring!) Neighborhood didn't seem like the best place but with a group you should be ok.

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel”
Reviews.Author: davidzhai
Reviews.Content: Worst hotel I have ever seen. I stayed in the hotel on 20, 21 and 25 in Dec, 2007. I saw a complain even on the first day (20,Dec) when I was checking in: A room was open when the guest went out (he locked the door). The front desk explained that maybe the cleaning person forget to close the door after the room service. Unfortunately I did not pay too much attention on it since I was thinking about to find a place to eat and shop. I went out with my GPS and had a dinner nearby (less than 2 hours for sure about 5pm to 7pm) at. The next morning after taking the breakfast in the hotel (first floor), I packed my luggage to go to the tourist site and found out my laptop and digital camera were gone. At the first thought, I had thought I was stolen in the morning. But finally found out they were gone in the previous night because my laptop, camera and GPS were put together but the GPS was not stolen. They take my laptop and camera on the first when I moved in but did not take my laptop case so that I even did not realize it was gone. Furthermore, the service there is very poor too and the front desks are very rude. All the guests (mainly from China) in this hotel were arranged by the tourist agent (sea gull group) and they knew few about this hotel till moved in. I communicated with them, most of them were complaining the trip too. Strongly recommend you not staying in this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Bad Knights Inn”
Reviews.Author: TRAVELALERT
Reviews.Content: i've stayed at other knights inn which were fine,but this knights inn was bad,our first room was very smelly,our next room was fresher but hot water was cold,we took cold showers,toilet overflowed,holes in the blankets.front office was not helpful,also very noisy because downtown stairs there is a after hour bar that stays open untill 5am,yes we did not sleep well!

HotelInfo.Name: Knights Inn Los Angeles
HotelInfo.Address: 1255 W Temple Street, Los Angeles, CA 90026
